title: Retro Typing Arena
prompt: Create an INSANE retro typing challenge game with: synthwave wavy grid background that reacts to typing speed/combo, theatrical Web Audio bleep bloops for every keystroke, combo fanfares, fever mode explosions, 4 game modes (SURVIVAL, TIME_ATTACK, PERFECT_RUN, BOSS_BATTLE with ASCII art bosses), CRT visual effects including screen shake/RGB split/scanlines/phosphor glow, particle explosions on word completion. Make it feel like typing inside a CRT that's about to explode. Single HTML file.
note: Built by orchestrating 4 parallel opus subagents: grid system, audio system, game engine, visual effects. Then combined into single HTML.
